ygData.subject: AllaKhazam and recommeded levels
ygData.msgSnippet: I was looking something up on AllaKhazam when I took a peek at some of the new item reviews. One in particular looked good for my druid. A nice drop in Luclin.
ygData.messageBody:
I was looking something up on AllaKhazam when I took a peek at some
of the new item reviews. One in particular looked good for my druid.
A nice drop in Luclin. I investigated the journey and the target
creature, and it looked quite do-able for my character. However, I
was confused by the review on AllaKhazam stating that the recommended
level to attain was 50. I am lvl 30, and the npc doing the drop is 25-
25. The journey, though long, is not particularly difficult, at least
from what the maps and bestiary information indicate.

Am I missing something about these recommended levels on the
AllaKhazam reviews?

Barto Proudfoot
